task.title: Validate Targeting to New or Returning Visitors
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to validate targeting to new or returning users.

step.cmd: In your browser, delete all mbox cookies.

stepresult.p: This allows you to appear as a new user (new visitor).

step.cmd: Browse to the targeted campaign, experience or mbox, or conversion mbox.
Verify you see the expected content for a new user.
Test the expected content (or lack of content ) shows for a returning visitor.

stepresult.p: Close your browser, and reopen it. Do not delete your mbox cookies. Confirm that as a returning visitor, you see the expected content.
A "returning visitor" is someone who is on the website for at least their second session.

Tip: To imitate being a return visitor for testing purposes, there must be at least 30 minutes of inactivity between site views. When a second session has started, a new sessionID appears in the mboxDebug popup utility.

step.cmd: If segments filters are set, confirm reports correctly capture the parameter values.
